name: MasterSwords
0:
”Alexa, open master swords.”
”Alexa, play master swords.”
”How am I doing?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: master swords
des:
Your Uncle's master swords have been stolen. Your mission is to retrieve them by searching the four kingdoms. You'll do battle against grubby gramlins, hideous orcs, wicked-tongued witches, brain-hungry zombies and a horde of other fantastical creatures. 

Words are your weapons! Defeat each enemy you encounter by spelling words correctly. Pick up special magical items for your backpack to aid you on your quest. Expand your vocabulary and flaunt your spelling prowess in three difficulty levels: Easy, tricky and masterful.
 - Easy words are the easiest to spell. For young adventurers who are just learning starting out.
- Tricky words are just a little bit harder.
- Masterful words for older children, expert spellers and adults. 

MasterSwords helps children and adults improve their spelling in a fun and exciting way. Explore a rich and fantastical universe with hidden surprises lurking around every corner. 

HELPFUL HINTS:
- If you need help at any point in the skill just say "help"!
- Wondering how you're doing? say "status update" or "how am I doing?"
- To use magic items you've collected during a battle say "backpack!"
- To reset the skill say "reset."
- Change your difficulty level by saying "change difficulty."

- Keep an eye out for updates as we add new enemies, new scenes and more master swords!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
